forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny, with a high near 65. West southwest wind around 21 mph, with gusts as high as 26 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of drizzle after 11pm. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 56. West southwest wind 9 to 21 mph, with gusts as high as 26 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

weather_report:
In Downtown San Francisco, the afternoon sun bathes the city in a warm glow, casting long shadows as the temperature flirts with a comfortable high of 65 degrees. A brisk west-southwest wind stirs, creating a symphony with the leaves, while gusts invite a playful dance in the air. As the sun begins its descent, the sky remains largely clear, although whispers of clouds gather, hinting at the gentle curtain of a possible drizzle later tonight. A low of around 56 degrees awaits, accompanied by the familiar rustle of fabric as folks will want to layer—perhaps a light jacket over a favorite tee.

The allure of this charming day beckons the urban wanderer. Now is the time to meander along the Embarcadero, where the gentle breeze carries the scent of salt and life. One might find solace in a local café, perhaps seeking out a corner to enjoy a warm drink while watching the world wander by. If inclined, a stroll through the city’s eclectic neighborhoods will reveal the vibrant threads of culture and artistry that pulse beneath the surface, each tableau waiting to be discovered as the day gracefully drifts into evening.
